about_the_game:
Embark on an endless journey through the fiery skies in "Floink Yoink", where the only goal is to reach the highest score imaginable! Take control of a brave pig with wings as you navigate an ever-changing landscape of flaming pipes, each flap bringing you closer to greatness or the brink of crispy catastrophe.

In this adrenaline-pumping flappy action game, the challenge never ends. Test your reflexes and endurance as you soar through the flames, collecting tasty treats and dodging obstacles with lightning-fast reactions. With each passing moment, the intensity mounts, pushing you to your limits and beyond.

Compete against yourself and friends as you strive for piggy perfection, aiming for the ultimate high score that will cement your place in porky legend. With its addictive gameplay, vibrant visuals, and pulse-pounding soundtrack, "Floink Yoink" will keep you coming back for more, determined to surpass your previous best and claim the title of top piggy pilot.

Do you have what it takes to conquer the endless skies and achieve piggy greatness? There's only one way to find out. Take to the skies in "Floink Yoink" and let the endless adventure begin!

name: Floink Yoink

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256M
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on an endless journey through the fiery skies in "Floink Yoink", where the only goal is to reach the highest score imaginable! Take control of a brave pig with wings as you navigate an ever-changing landscape of flaming pipes, each flap bringing you closer to become crispy bacon!
